div.p: Yours of the 28 Febr co yrs = tinday I am sorry you had so mcuh trouble about busines which I have kept from you always but it cannot be avoided and I am sure you do this but you can so do not worry see how Zan if he cannot get some young man of his acquaintance to help you if he cannont write to Aleck and see if he has time time come on and pay him what he gets from the Insurence of for his time how would it do for you to go to Rockford if you cannot be seated at Bloomington, I have applied for an appointment as Treasury Aid for Aleck the duties are similar to Inspector of the Customs with which he is familiar I have not written him to know if he wanted it but from what he

said when I saw himthink he would like it you ask if he would like it, have as much to do further two months I can lay by enough to buy a small farm but still hope to be able to, get to LaGrange in a month or two, and then I hope to have you with me and let the girls stay at school for I am satisfied that I can make all the money I want in five years after the war ends, by my pretense in LaGrange this Memphis is the dirtiest meanest hole I ever was in. the streets are always either mud or dust, and both worse than I ever saw any where else I sent you on the 2o a Draft for $300 and will send more this week which will pay all and you had better get good warm clothes and shawls I hope you will not need furs on this winter if so we may be there able to get them, the number of people you speak of in Joliet certainly me. I did not think that town

would ever fill up again nor do I know what they can do for a living I hope you may be able to get some young man to help you mow as you will have many to pay for it and that you will be far from business troubles hereafter, I do not recognise the Photograph you sent - and think you had better put the names on the back you know I can scarsely enable the Photographs of anyone I suppose however it is Charlotte from the hat in her lap have all the children & yourself taken and send me soon - I have been disturbed by visitors this morning and must clos to be in time for church so good bye - Love and kisses to all tell the girls they must write me at least once a week
